content.text: A rewrite of the Ra Material (The Law of One) in narrative book format. The original material, received by Don Elkins, Carla L. Rueckert, and Jim McCarty between 1981 and 1984, is in question-and-answer format. This project transforms it into continuous prose for easier reading.
This work was created by Carlos Mart√≠nez with the help of artificial intelligence.

This project was created with AI assistance. While every effort has been made to maintain accuracy and fidelity to the original material, AI-generated content may contain inaccuracies, inconsistencies, or misinterpretations.
This work should be used as a supplementary study tool only. For authoritative understanding, always refer to the original Ra Material at llresearch.org.
